67403.「この遺跡こそ 試練の地……王者の座。:
These ruins are the trial...the Seat of the
Sovereign.

67404.「決して止むことのない 竜巻に守られて\n 幾星霜の時代を 経てきました。:
We have passed through many eras, protected by
tornadoes that never cease.

67405.「この遺跡に 入ることができるのは \n すべての王者の武具を 身につけた者だけ:
Only those wearing all the Sovereign's armor
pieces may enter these ruins.

67406.「王者の武具は 五大陸にある 各種族の王家\n グレン メギストリス ヴェリナー:
The Armor of the Champion has been handed down to the royal houses of each species on the five continents, Glen, Megistris, Verinard,
Kamiharmui, and Dolworm.

67407.「世告げの姫たちが 各国の王家へ伝えています。\n それらの国をお訪ねになれば:
The Oracle Princesses have passed them on to the royal families of various countries. If you visit these countries, you will find
someone who knows where to find the armor of kings.

67408.「すべての王者の武具が そろいましたら\n 最後の儀式を いたします。:
When all the champions' armor is assembled, we
will perform the last rites.

67409.「私は 落陽の草原にて <pc>さまの\n お戻りを お待ちしています。王者の武:
I await your return, <pc>, in the
Sunset Meadow. Please come to me, dressed in
the Sovereign's armor.

67410.<center>……よくぞ ここまで たどり着いた。: I'm amazed you made it this far.

67411.<center>私は かつて 天上より舞い降りて\n聖竜グレイナルと共に 災厄に:
I am the one who was once descended from the heavens to challenge calamity with the holy Dragon Fighter Grainall, and was proclaimed
the champion.

67412.<center>今の世に現れた 災厄と戦うために\n王者の資格を求める者よ……。:
Ye who seek the credentials of a champion to
fight the scourge that has come upon the
world.

67413.<center>さあ これを受け取るといい。\nそれは どんな恐怖にも立ち向かう:
Now, take this. It is the unbreakable courage
to face any fear.

67414.<center>そなたに チカラを与えるのは\n私ばかりではない。:
I am not the only one who can give you
strength.

67415.<center>かつて 世界のために命を懸けた\n勇ましき神話の戦士たちが そな:
The heroic and mythical warriors who once
risked their lives for the world will support
you in your courageous fight...
